DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare subjective objective effect Oxymorphone ER ( Opana ER ) versus Oxycodone CR ( Oxycontin ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Oxymorphone Extended-Release ( Opana ER ) Versus Oxycodone Controlled-Release ( Oxycontin )
DOC.criteria: Recreational opioid use . At least 3 lifetime occasion recreational use oral intact modifiedrelease opioid product . BMI within range 19.0 29.9 kg/m2 , inclusive , minimum weight 50.0 kg screen Day 0 treatment period 1 Selfreported history drug alcohol dependence past 2 year presence drug alcohol dependence past 12 month define DSMIV , include subject ever drug rehabilitation program . Unwillingness inability abstain recreational drug use require study . History acute asthma obstructive airway disease condition may increase risk respiratory depression , judge clinically significant investigator designee . History neurologic condition convulsive disorder severe head injury , judge clinically significant investigator qualify designee . History Addison 's disease , hypothyroidism , pancreatitis , prostatic hypertrophy , urethral stricture . Use nonprescription prescription medication natural health product within 7 day prior first drug administration qualification phase throughout study , unless opinion investigator designee , product interfere study procedure data integrity compromise safety subject . Uses Monoamine oxidize inhibitor ( MAOIs ) within 14 day first drug administration qualification phase throughout study . Current consumption great 20 cigarette ( 2 cigar ) per day inability abstain smoking ( use nicotinecontaining sub stance ) least 14 hour .
